oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Stars were formerly people. Some details regarding their singing. The opening of flowers from their buds compared with the former ways of the star. In the Katkop dialect, by D !kw in (L.V.
5663, rev., note). Stars resemble the Moon and used to be people. The stars resemble the budding flowers on trees. The stars burn like little fires.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Stars and flowers
